home.title:
Welcome to Copy
& Printshop 't Hartje
home.subtitle: A trusted name in Groningen for over 45 years.
home.introduction:
We are your go-to destination for everything related to copying, printing, and press services.
We also offer a wide range of office supplies and cartridges.

copyPrint.title: Copy & Print
copyPrint.introduction: Fast printing or copying, from letters to reports. Make use of our self-service.

customPrinting.title: Custom Print
customPrinting.introduction: Professional printing for your communication materials and promotional tools.

customClothing.title: Custom Clothing
customClothing.introduction: Personalize your clothing and textiles with unique prints.

officeSupplies.title: Office Supplies
officeSupplies.introduction: Everything you need to set up and optimize your workspace for efficiency.

openingHours.title: Opening hours
openingHours.telePhone: On business days, we are available by phone from

contact.title: Got a question?
contact.subtitle:
Can't find the right product or price?
Or would you like to know more about submitting assignments?
You can always request a free, no-obligation quote via:

introduction.title: Clothing Printing
introduction.text:
We offer various techniques for printing your clothing.
We can print and cut on flex material, which is ideal for a logo or text in a single color.
Additionally, we have a DTG machine, which stands for Direct To Garment. This allows us to print directly onto clothing.
introduction.subText: If you bring your own clothing, please keep the following in mind:
introduction.listItem2: Printing on your own clothing is at your own risk

pricingFlexVinyl.tableIntroduction:
Flex material works great for clean, single-color designs
like logos and text. Below are our rates for printing and cutting.

pricingDtg.tableIntroduction:
Our DTG printer allows us to print directly onto clothing, ideal for detailed
and vibrant designs. Below are the rates for garment printing.

customPrintPage.overviewTitle: An Overview of Our Printing Services
customPrintPage.overviewIntroduction: Explore our wide range of custom printing options. From business cards and flyers to textile prints and large-format printing, we have solutions for every need. Click on a category to learn more and get inspired by the possibilities.
customPrintPage.contactTitle: Would you like to receive a quote for a product? We would be happy to provide you with a tailored quote. Requesting a quote is free and easy.

stickers.title: Stickers
stickers.introduction: Our stickers are available in various sizes, shapes, and quantities, fully tailored to your needs. Whether you require round, oval, large, or small stickers, we offer the perfect solution.

stickers.largeFormatContent: Large-format stickers can easily be ordered individually.
stickers.materialContent: All stickers are produced on high-gloss, self-adhesive white vinyl of premium quality, perfectly suited for a wide range of applications.

cards.title: Business Cards
cards.introduction: Minimale afname 100 stuks, de kaartjes worden geprint op 350gr.papier. De prijzen zijn op basis van een en het zelfde bestand. Dubbel gevouwen visitekaartjes is prijs keer 2. De kaartjes worden gesneden en u krijgt een plastic bewaardoosje.

flyers.title: Flyers
flyers.introductionFlyers: Here you will find an overview of the costs for printing flyers in A5 and A6 formats, with options for single- and double-sided printing. Choose from a variety of paper types to create the perfect look for your flyers.

folders.title: Folders
folders.introductionFolders: Here you will find an overview of the costs for printing brochures in A3 and A4 formats. Choose between a bi-fold or tri-fold option to present your message effectively. The rates are clearly displayed by paper type and quantity.

posters.title: Posters
posters.introductionPosters: Explore the options for printing posters here. Choose from a wide range of sizes and paper types to perfectly tailor your poster to your needs. Whether you're looking for a simple black-and-white print or a vibrant color print, we have the right solution for you. Browse the options below and find the ideal combination for your project.

copyPrintPage.title: Copy and Print
copyPrintPage.introduction: Easily and quickly take care of your copies and prints using our services. Our self-service printers allow you to print documents directly from a USB stick or download them from your email.
copyPrintPage.introductionBinding: We also offer binding and laminating services to give your documents a neat and professional finish. Perfect for business purposes, school projects, or personal documents!

contactPage.contactIntroduction: Do you have questions about our products or services, or would you like to know more about the associated costs? Please fill out our form, and we will ensure you receive a quote quickly and without any obligation.
contactPage.messageAlert: Don't forget to include your contact details.

term-1.title: 1. Acknowledgment of Our Terms
term-1.termContent:
The following terms apply to every quotation, sale, or work performed by 't Hartje.
The buyer/orderer is deemed to know and accept the general terms and conditions as stipulated below.

term-2.title: 2. Quotations
term-2.termContent:
Our prices and offers are non-binding and without obligation.
All quoted prices include VAT unless otherwise stated.
Our quotations are valid for a maximum period of 14 days from the date of the quotation.

term-3.title: 3. Orders
term-3.termContent:
a) Once an order has been placed, cancellation is only possible with mutual consent.
b) If the order is unilaterally terminated by the customer, the customer must still pay the total amount due.

term-4.title: 4. Payment
term-4.termContent:
Orders placed in our store can be paid for upon pickup. Payments can be made by card or in cash.
Orders placed by us with our in-house printer must be paid for in full in advance.
If the order amount is not paid within the payment term set by us (14 days) and payment remains outstanding
after a reminder from us,we reserve the right to engage a collection agency.
Any additional collection costs will be borne by the customer.

term-5.title: 5. Prices
term-5.termContent: 't Hartje reserves the right to adjust prices due to fluctuating increases in paper and printing costs.

term-6.title: 6. Deliveries
term-6.termContent:
We do our utmost to meet the agreed delivery time.
However, no rights can be derived from this.
For orders placed with our in-house printer, delivery times are always subject to change.

term-7.title: 7. Complaints
term-7.termContent: Do you have a complaint about the delivered item? Then you must report it within 2 working days.
